SEARCH
Package grafiosch.repository

Interface UDFDataJpaRepository.IUDFRepository<S extends UDFMetadata>

Type Parameters:
S - the specific UDFMetadata entity type that extends the base UDFMetadata class
All Known Subinterfaces:
UDFMetadataGeneralJpaRepository, UDFMetadataGeneralJpaRepositoryCustom, UDFMetadataSecurityJpaRepository, UDFMetadataSecurityJpaRepositoryCustom
All Known Implementing Classes:
UDFMetadataGeneralJpaRepositoryImpl, UDFMetadataSecurityJpaRepositoryImpl
Enclosing interface:
UDFDataJpaRepository
public static interface UDFDataJpaRepository.IUDFRepository<S extends UDFMetadata>
Generic interface contract for UDF metadata repositories that support user-defined field operations. This interface defines the standard operations that any UDF metadata repository must implement to provide metadata information for user-defined fields, regardless of the specific metadata type (general, security-specific, etc.). Implementations of this interface serve as bridges between the UDF data layer and the specific metadata repositories, enabling polymorphic access to different types of UDF metadata while maintaining a consistent API for UDF operations.

  • Method Details

    • getMetadataByUserAndEntityAndIdEntity

      List<S> getMetadataByUserAndEntityAndIdEntity(Integer idUser, String entity, Integer idEntity)
      Retrieves UDF metadata entries for a specific user, entity type, and entity instance. This method returns the metadata definitions that apply to the specified combination of user, entity class, and entity instance, which are used for validation and form generation of user-defined fields. The returned metadata includes field definitions, validation rules, data types, and other properties necessary for proper UDF data handling and user interface generation.
      Parameters:
      idUser - the ID of the user for whom to retrieve UDF metadata
      entity - the name of the entity class for which UDF metadata is requested
      idEntity - the ID of the specific entity instance that may influence metadata selection
      Returns:
      a list of UDF metadata entries applicable to the specified user, entity type, and entity instance

    • getSupportedEntities

      List<String> getSupportedEntities()
      Returns the list of entity class names that are supported by this UDF metadata repository. This method provides information about which entity types can have user-defined fields managed by this particular metadata repository implementation. The returned entity names correspond to the simple class names of entities that have been configured to support user-defined fields through this metadata repository. This information is used for validation and routing UDF operations to the appropriate metadata repository.
      Returns:
      a list of entity class names (simple names) that support UDF operations through this metadata repository
